document_title: Ventricular septal defect: Causes, symptoms and treatment
subsection_name: thong-lien-that.json_9_Diagnosis and treatment of ventricular septal defects at the Cardiovascular Center, Tam Anh General Hospital System
subsection_content:
Equipped with a modern machinery system, under the dedicated examination and treatment of a team of leading experts, the Cardiovascular Center, Tam Anh General Hospital System specializes in receiving and successfully treating cases of heart disease. Congenital heart diseases such as ventricular septal defect, atrial septal defect, valvular stenosis/regurgitation, arrhythmia... using minimally invasive intervention or surgery techniques, reduce pain, and help children recover quickly. The center brings together experts specializing in the field of Congenital Heart who will care for and closely monitor the child's treatment process to detect abnormalities and intervene promptly.
To schedule an appointment at the Cardiovascular Center of Tam Anh General Hospital System, please contact:
Ventricular septal defect can be cured if the child is detected early and treated properly. This is a congenital heart defect that cannot be completely prevented, but pregnant mothers' compliance with a reasonable nutrition and exercise regimen during pregnancy will help minimize the risk of ventricular septal defect in the fetus.
